term.title: interferons

item.text: A class of glycoproteins (with sugar groups attached at specific locations) important in immune function. They are able to inhibit the multiplication of viruses in cells.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 158 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
